title: Implement findById in MessageRepository
description: Implement findById method in MessageRepository class. Create SQL query to fetch message by ID. Return null if message not found, otherwise map database record to Message domain entity using toDomain mapper.
dod: findById method implemented with proper SQL query
Query uses parameterized statement to prevent SQL injection
Returns null when message ID not found
Uses toDomain mapper to convert database record to Message entity
Proper error handling with try-catch block
